name: Escape Navarathri Golu
description: Escape Navarathri Golu is the new point and click escape game from ajazgames.This golu is a navarathi pooja or celebration in india which there are dolls kept built up steps small steps inside house. Here in your friends place you find this golu kept and there is empty place in the golu stand, find the missing golu doll, all the best, wish you good luck
